COMPUTER SCIENCE
NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY

I’m a fifth-year BA/MS student at Northwestern studying Computer Science. In the past, I’m grateful to have been a Kleiner Perkins Engineering Fellow at Hatch and an intern at Facebook. I like building software, working with fun people, and taking care of my dog. I love to meet new people, so please reach out if we can help each other!
